column1: Nautica Voyage Eau De Toilette for Men - Fresh, Romantic, Fruity Scent Woody, Aquatic Notes of Apple, Water Lotus, Cedarwood, and Musk Ideal Day Wear 3.3 Fl Oz
ROMANTIC AND FRUITY: For an active and romantic man who lives by his own rules.
FRESH AND MASCULINE: Fresh and salty sea breeze that carries romantic scents of coastal herbs and woods.
VERSATILE AND LONG-LASTING: Can be worn casually or formally.
NAUTICA FRAGRANCES: Scents that support your curiosity for life, so that you are ready to take on the day, wherever it takes you.
FOR THOSE WHO DESIRE TO DISCOVER THE ADVENTURES THAT AWAIT

The Voyager Man dares to take on uncharted waters, determined to discover the adventures that await. He's a man on a journey, but he doesn't need a map to navigate his own destiny. Whenever he needs inspiration, he looks to the ocean.
Feel the spirit of the sea accompanying you at every step with VOYAGE eau de toilette. Notes of fresh cut apple, water lotus and cedarwood give this fragrance undeniable masculinity.

This deodorizing body spray is a refreshing scent reminiscent of the cool, crisp wind and fresh sea air. Whether you're sailing to remote islands or hard at work, you'll exclude self-assurance with NAUTICA VOYAGE.
A blend of apple and water lotus laid on a woody base, combined of cedarwood, musk, and amber.
Product Dimensions: ‎ 2 x 3.5 x 4.5 inches; 3.52 ounces
Best Sellers Rank: #21 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care)
Green Leaf, Apple, Drenched Mimosa, Sailcloth Accord, Water Lotus, Cedar Wood, Musk, Moss, Amber
Important: Keep in cool dry places.
